title: Hello to the metaverse!
content:
# gm! 

 Fellow buildoors, rotatoors and wordcels, for the longest time our content and distribution has been at the mercy of big tech and big media. It's time we change that, here is to the future of publishing. 

 ![gm](https://arweave.net/NFvu_X5lQC0BwiVBi3LampM-7pM8P6SpNc8DRC-r6Eo)
